entities.description: Frequency with which parents required the respondent to perform work/chores in the past 12 months.
Frequency with which parents limited the amount of TV time for the respondent in the past 12 months.
Frequency with which parents limited the time respondent went out with friends on school nights in the past 12 months.
Frequency with which parents let the respondent know they had done a good job in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates how often the respondent's parents made them perform work or chores around the house in the past 12 months.
Indicates how often the respondent's parents limited the amount of TV time in the past 12 months.
Indicates how often the respondent's parents limited their time spent out with friends on school nights in the past 12 months.
Indicates how often the respondent's parents let them know they had done a good job in the past 12 months.
